channel.title: Blacklight: Tango Down
channel.description:
Thoughts? Demo is available free from the xbox marketplace (not sure about PS2).
Just watch the video at the end of this post for all the info...its a $15 arcade game blowing myself (and other peoples) minds.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xY1FKOuovNs
PS: Demo is the full game, with a 1 hour timer (timer only runs when playing in game, not on menu etc)

item.title: Blacklight: Tango Down

Looks kinda gay tbh…

item.title: Blacklight: Tango Down
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Can’t say much other than all I’ve seen is my brother play it and it looks decent. The aiming doesn’t seem to fit. Supposed to aim down sights and it doesn’t fully go? Instead you get some cross hairs above the iron sights that confuse the hell out of where you’re actually aiming

Read full topic
